article_title: Medical-College Entrance Exam Gets an Overhaul
article_text:
The essay section is out and sociology is in, and test-takers will need to be as familiar with psychology terms, such as “reciprocal determinism,” as they are with organic chemistry.

The 8,200 aspiring doctors expected to take the Medical College Admission Test, or MCAT, this week will find a very different exam than their predecessors took.

The new test, the first major revision in 25 years, is longer (by 3 hours), broader...

twitter.description: Aspiring doctors taking the new Medical College Admission Test, or MCAT, will find an exam that is longer, covers more subjects, and is more interdisciplinary than past versions.
twitter.creator: @MelindaBeckWSJ

image.alt: Taking the test for medical school this year? This isn’t your father’s entrance exam #MCAT #MCAT2015

twitter.title: Medical-College Entrance Exam Gets an Overhaul

article_summary:
The 8,200 aspiring doctors expected to take the Medical College Admission Test, or MCAT, this week will find a very different exam than their predecessors took.
The new test, the first major revision in 25 years, is longer (by 3 hours), broader...
The essay section is out and sociology is in, and test-takers will need to be as familiar with psychology terms, such as “reciprocal determinism,” as they are with organic chemistry.
